sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content:
The Focallocal Community is an international collective of pro-active people, together exploring creative and fun activities to make the World around us a friendlier, happier and safer place.

We live in a time where more and more people feel a responsibility to change the the many societal ills we've inherited, and are increasingly frustrated by our lack of power to affect these issues ..we all want to be a part of creating positive change, but knowing where to start is difficult, and modern lives can be so busy that many of us worry about being able to commit to a regular role helping a good cause.

Our Positive Action Community changes it all! The Focallocal Community is built around the principles that lasting change is best achieved when it is:

  1. Created by local people
  2. Achieved using positivity and positive actions
  3. Incremental - built from many small actions
  4. Most importantly, Simple, Easy, Social, and FUN!

quote.quote: Be the Change you want to see in the World.
quote.author: Ghandi

cards.title: Activities
cards.description: We invite positive, friendly and pro-active Focallocaller anywhere in the World to meet you and create Positive Action together. Meet other people who want to make World a better place and have fun doing it!

cards.title: International Action Days
cards.description: Join thousands of others in cities all across the World, creating buttlerfly effects of positive energy all across our planet. Let's celebrate the joy of being alive together!

cards.title: Projects
cards.description: Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects Text about projects

cards.title: Happiness Challenges
cards.description: To change the world around you, you first have to change the World within you. One task every day for 30 days is usually enough to form a long term habit which will increase your mental health and happiness.
